title: blue light
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in front of a laptop. it's nightime and the blue light from the laptop is illuminating the room.

title: toilet
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting on a toilet, bending forward to the point their face is hidden. the colour pallete is green.

title: shower
alt: digital drawing of a person standing under a shower. their face is hidden behind their long hair. the colour pallete is blue.

title: single star
alt: digital drawing of a person looking up a sky window. it's nightime, and the light from a single star above is illuminating the room.

title: reflection
alt: digital drawing of a person standing in front of a bathroom mirror, leaning on a sink in front of a mirror. the reflection shows their worried expression.

title: exam
alt: digital drawing of a person taking an exam. their brain is showing through their head, spilling onto the paper in front of them.

title: green screen irony
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in front of a laptop. it's nightime and the green light from the laptop displaying plants is illuminating the room.

title: grieving the night sky
alt: digital drawing of a person standing under a sky window. they are looking up the bright blue night sky, with a couple of stars and crying.

title: golden tears
alt: digital drawing of a person inspired by the style of Alfons Mucha. they are waring a long, creme dress, and their long dark brown hair is flowing. they are crying golden tears.

title: ok
alt: digital drawing of a person inspired by the style of Alfons Mucha. they are standing, wearing a long dress, and in front of them are plants. the colour pallete is black and white.

title: self portrait
alt: digital portrait of a person with shoulder-length, brown hair. they are looking to the right.

title: body
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting. they are curled up and looking at the viewer.

title: confession
alt: digital drawing of a person standing in front of a window. they are holding a phone displaying a picture of the moon. the window behind is covered, with small beam of light illuminating the background.

title: home alone
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in front a big window. the light is harshly illuminating them from the back. their eyes are closed and next to them a phone with headphones is lying.

title: self portrait
alt: digital portrait of a person with short hair. they are looking towards the viewer.

title: transparent
alt: digital drawing of half body of a person. they look scared, and their fingers are transparent through their body

title: green shot
alt: digital drawing of a person against a deep blue background. they are holding a bunch of leaves in their hand. in the background, the same bunch of leaves are forming a shape of a puddle behind their head.

title: green light
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in front of a laptop. it's dark, and a harsh green light is illuminating their face and body. they look robot-like.

title: two worlds
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in an empty room. next to them is a phone, illuminating half the room with blue light. behind them is a window, illuminating the other half of the room with yellow light.

title: smoking
alt: digital drawing of a person standing next to an open widow. they are leaning agains the windowsill, holding a cigarette. smoke from the cigarette is going out the window.

title: my room
alt: digital drawing of a person lying on a floor bed in a room. next to them is an extension cable, with a phone charger plugged in it. they are looking somewhere in the distance.

title: ophelia
alt: digital drawing of a person lying down. they are wearing headphones and holding a phone in their left hand. a charging cable with leaves growing from it is plugged into the phone.

title: self portrait
alt: digital portrait of a person with short hair. they are looking to the left. their left eye has a glitching effect

title: mealtime
alt: digital drawing of a person eating in front of a laptop. they are looking at the screen, which is illuminating their face from below.

title: who are you?
alt: digital drawing of a person standng in front of a mirror. they are reaching to touch the reflection, which is reaching back. the reflection is melting and looking at the viewer.

title: the note
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting in front of a laptop. on the laptop there is a document open, with a melting eye looking at the person.

title: back home
alt: digital drawing of a person sitting at a table, holding cuttlery. on the plate in front of them is a house. behing a window in the background there are many tall buildings.
